    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    LuaBool
    Simple enum for representing the Booleans from lua
    LuaConcatable
    Simple interface for implimenting the concatable proeprty of some types in lua
    LuaNum
    LuaNum is the representation of lua's number type which can represent both integers and decimals like the LuaString type this attempts to maintain all observable properties of the number type in lua
    LuaObject
    Simple interface that all lua type classes extend
    LuaString
    LuaString is a representation of the String type in lua that theoretically preserves all the properties of Lua's strings such as that all strings with the same content are the same string this property is achieved through a soft flyweight
    LuaTable
    Class to represent lua tables and decoded them from a serialized lua table string (as per the Minecraft OpenComputers mod serialization library), some specifics may not yet be implimented
    SoftFlyweightUtil
    Simple abstract class for containing utility methods for SofrFlyweights (flyweights that use softreferences)
